description: A performance merino short liner for long rides, enduro racing or multi-day adventures. Climb, descend and do it again from dawn ‘til dusk in naturally air-conditioned merino comfort. Enduro uses their Merino Air-Con 140. Nature's climate control - It keeps you cool when you're hot, warm when its not.
name: Mons Royale Enduro Bike Short Liner - AOP - Mens
